revised_title: Prothalli of Ophioglossum pendulum, Helminthostachys zeylanica, and Psilotum sp.
tldr: The author examines the prothalli of Ophioglossum pendulum, Helminthostachys zeylanica, and a potential Psilotum sp. They describe the morphology, growth patterns, and reproductive structures of these plants, as well as the presence of an endophytic fungus in their tissues.
